content: Hi all - here is a draft of the Alert for Admission and Discharge Resource Graph - comments appreciated. There two ways to link to a Condition in Encounter - Diagnoses and ReasonReference (reason for admission). I think either might be used - thoughts from ADT implementers/users? Alert-for-Admission-and-Discharge-Resource-Graph.pdf Alert-for-Admission-and-Discharge-Resource-Graph.vsdx

Reminder to go to the beginnings of the draft and review the narrative content. In addition to corrections to what is there, what else should we be documenting here. Feel free to post your paragraphs, comments, etc here.
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-alerts/branches/master/index.html
I don't have a way to open that graph file -- can you post as a PDF, image, or web page?

I'm also having trouble finding the content in the guide that documents what the proposed protocols are (description of use cases, roles of each actor, examples, etc). Can you share a more specific link?

Using a FHIR bundle to relay the alert to an interested actor

This seems like the use case for FHIR Messaging. Have you looked at the MessageHeader resource?
